case.title: looking for someone - 39 (Flatiron)
case.text: I hate alone, but sometimes I need wait until you appear in my life. I don't know what you look like, but i know when I saw you in first glance you are that man. I am 5"4, 114lbs, asia background, good job and good personality. You: some kind of handsome, wise, good personality and love travel. you had better introduce yourself with your pictures. thank you !
